titleInfo.title: Gospel Sing at Waycross Memorial Stadium (17687)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Two color half-sheet (red and blue on white) announcing the World's Largest Annual Sun-Down to Sun-Up Gospel Sing featuring the Happy Goodman Family, the Kingsmen, Sego Brothers and Naomi, Betty Jean Robinson, the Telestials, the Vikings, and Willie Wynn and the Tennesseans at Waycross Memorial Stadium on August 24. Poster features a metal photoplate of the Happy Goodman Family. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/44074/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
